title: YMCA Website Services Sandbox
description: Welcome to the YMCA Website Services demo site! Compare currently offered on YMCA Website Services and discover the range of capabilities across different installation levels of the platform.
intro: Welcome to the YMCA Website Services demo site! Compare currently offered on YMCA Website Services and discover the range of capabilities across different installation levels of the platform.

cards.title: Carnation: Standard install
cards.description: Standard-level YMCA Website Services offers everything a YMCA Association needs for a comprehensive website. Carnation offers image-rich page layouts and simple, mobile-optimized menus.

cards.title: Carnation: Extended install
cards.description: Extended-level YMCA Website Services is an option for large YMCA Associations who desire deep integrations with third party software and advanced features. Carnation offers image-rich page layouts and simple, mobile-optimized menus.

cards.title: Carnation: Custom install
cards.description: Custom-level YMCA Website Services is for developers to review all possible features, including experimental ones, available in YMCA Website Services.. Carnation offers image-rich page layouts and simple, mobile-optimized menus.
